#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int n, m, x = 0, count = 0;
    char c[100][100];
    while(cin>>n>>m)
    {
        if(n==0 && m==0) break;
        else x++;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++) cin>>c[i];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            for(int j=0;j<m;j++)
            {
                count = 0;
                if(c[i][j] == '*') continue;
                else
                {
                    if(c[i-1][j] == '*') count++;
                    if(c[i][j+1] == '*') count++;
                    if(c[i][j-1] == '*') count++;
                    if(c[i+1][j] == '*') count++;
                    if(c[i-1][j-1] == '*') count++;
                    if(c[i-1][j+1] == '*') count++;
                    if(c[i+1][j-1] == '*') count++;
                    if(c[i+1][j+1] == '*') count++;
                    count+=48;
                    c[i][j] = (char) count;
                }
            }
        }
        cout<<"Field #"<<x<<":"<<endl;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            for(int j=0;j<m;j++) cout<<c[i][j];
            cout<<endl;
        }
        if(n!=0 && m!=0) cout<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
